content.name: Gerdien V
content.review_content: We have had a wonderfull trip on the motorbike with our guide. We really enjoyed the beautiful views, we met local people and the food we had, was amazing. The owner helped us really well. After the trip he brought us to the trainstation where we get back to Hanoi. Thank you very much for this day!

content.name: Sara
content.review_title: Best place to visit Sapa and surrounding
content.review_content: The hotel was nice comfortable and clean  and very central in sapa. The owner Khoa (David) is super welcoming friendly and accommodating. He can Taylor made things for you bring you there or suggest you the best way to do tours things on your own shopping restaurants or anything you need.  Thanks to him our stay in sapa was fantastic . Best so far!

content.name: Mộc Miên
content.review_title: Cozy hotel and Value of money
content.review_content: Cozy hotel, perfect location, in the city center all the facilities by feet distance. The room was clean and really worthy for the price.  Besides that, the owner is lovely and really welcoming and helpful during my time. Highly recommended this place!

content.name: GoPlaces13537986408
content.review_title: đánh giá trải nghiệm ở Hà Giang Hotel SaPa
content.review_content: Đầy đủ tiện nghi , dịch vụ chăm sóc khách hàng tốt chu đáo , giá rẻ phòng đẹp. Chủ hotel vui tính nhiệt tình . Các bạn nên đến book phòng để trải nghiệm sẽ không làm mọi người thất vọng . Chúc mọi người có một kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời

hotel.location: 012 Phạm Xuân Huân, Sapa Việt Nam
hotel.name: Hà Giang Hotel Sapa
